content: समयः {@--1@} Time in general. {@--2@} Occasion, opportunity. {@--3@} Fit time, proper time or season, right moment; <ls>Ku. 3. 25.</ls> {@--4@} An agreement, a compact, contract, an engagement; मिथःसमयात् <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--5@} A convention, conventional usage. {@--6@} An established rule of conduct, a ceremonial custom, usual practice; निरस्तनारीसमया दुराधयः <ls>Ki. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>U. 1.</ls> {@--7@} The convention of poets; ({%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} that persons separated from their beloveds are affected at the sight of clouds). {@--8@} An appointment, assignation. {@--9@} A condition, stipulation; <ls>V. 5.</ls> {@--10@} A law, rule, regulation; <ls>Y. 3. 19</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 19.</ls> {@--11@} Direction, order, instruction, precept. {@--12@} Emergency, exigency. {@--13@} An oath. {@--14@} A sign, hint, indication. {@--15@} Limit, boundary. {@--16@} A demonstrated conclusion, doctrine, tenet; बौद्ध°, वैशेषिक° &c. {@--17@} End, conclusion, termination. {@--18@} Success, prosperity. {@--19@} End of trouble. (समयेन ‘on condition, conditionally’).
